TopicTitle: Why do i bring people coffee and mop the floor?

Articles.Content: Why? and how to increase it, purely on post count or rep has something to do? And while you answer this, how would you like your coffee?

I hope this thread has a point, and isn't just a chat thread, we had to ban those don't you know?

Also, black tea, no sugar.

I hope this thread has a point, and isn't just a chat thread, we had to ban those don't you know?

Also, black tea, no sugar.

considering what im doing (ahem) its pretty expectable and forgive able that i may not know some parts of it also, a fun talk is never pointless.

and i ll bring the tea in a minute
